page.title: 15Home Life.
page.content: Breakfast. We asked the thirty children in our class what they ate for breakfast.Five children had no breakfast,the other 25 having cereal.There are many different cereals that you can buy in packets. Weetabix,Shredded Wheat,Cornflakes, Special K and Sugar Puffs are some of the most popular.Half of the class also ate toast for breakfast.I had a Yoghurt.Fried breakfasts used to be very popular.It is called the Great British Breakfast and consists of fried bacon,fried egg,sausage and fried bread.It is not as popular today because people believe that fried food is not good for you.In the winter many of the children have hot porridge with sugar or sypup on it.In the last two years Breakfast Television has started.Before 1983 there were no television programmes in the morning.
